xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/861197-Dear Ike: Lost Letters to a Teen Idol 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j53KFnpgQ07qxPYN6DJwBUPb5bY.jpg In this animated documentary, Los Angeles filmmaker Dion Labriola recounts his all-consuming childhood quest to contact his teen idol, Ike Eisenmann - and the magical turn of events that led him toward his goal (some 40 years later). Dear Ike: Lost Letters to a Teen Idol
